Tokyo College 2022 International Women's Day Series

Event Series: Tackling Biases in Tech and the Workplace

All of March, I will be talking to some stellar women who are tackling biases in tech and the workplace. Come watch/hear what they have to say! Learn more

日本語訳を提供します。(Japanese translation will be provided)

- Want to know how researchers are tackling discrimination on Airbnb? Nanako Era, Lead Inclusion Researcher at Airbnb's LIVE talk on Thursday March 3 (4:15 pm PT) or Friday March 4 in Asia. MUST register beforehand here.

- Are you interested in art, racial justice, equity and inclusion? De Nichols, Senior UX Researcher at YouTube and author of “Art of Protest”. Interview to be released late March on YouTube.

- Curious about strategies for building more women- and family-friendly workplaces? Ho Kwan Cheung, PhD, Assistant Professor of Psychology at University at Albany SUNY. Interview to be released late March on YouTube.

If you’re free, maybe join us and invite 100 of your closest friends, family, coworkers, cats, dogs, etc? 🆗👏
